constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COHEN:
H.R. 1404.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H859]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue Northwest in the District of Columbia as the "Federal Bureau of Investigation Building".
